SEARCH
Package handlers

Class MedicalCertificateHandler

java.lang.Object
handlers.MedicalCertificateHandler
public class MedicalCertificateHandler extends Object
Handles the operations related to managing medical certificates, including loading, saving, viewing, and updating their statuses.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCertificate(MedicalCertificate certificate)
    Adds a new medical certificate to the list and saves it to the CSV file.

    Returns the singleton instance of the MedicalCertificateHandler.

    Updates the status of a medical certificate based on user input.

    Displays all medical certificates in the system.

  • Method Details

    • addCertificate

      public void addCertificate(MedicalCertificate certificate)
      Adds a new medical certificate to the list and saves it to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      certificate - the MedicalCertificate object to add

    • getInstance

      public static MedicalCertificateHandler getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the MedicalCertificateHandler.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance

    • viewCertificatesForPatient

      public static void viewCertificatesForPatient(Patient patient)
      Displays all medical certificates for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient whose certificates are to be displayed

    • viewAllCertificates

      public static void viewAllCertificates()
      Displays all medical certificates in the system.

    • updateCertificateStatus

      public void updateCertificateStatus(Doctor doctor, Scanner scanner)
      Updates the status of a medical certificate based on user input.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the Doctor updating the status
      scanner - a Scanner object for user input

    • viewPendingCertificates

      public static boolean viewPendingCertificates()
      Displays pending medical certificates.
      Returns:
      true if pending certificates are found, false otherwise
